modName: Halloween Windia.  Rosa Simple. Main Menu Replacer
summary: Halloween Windia & Rosa Simple Main Menu
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Please do not upload it to another site.[/size][/color]


[size=3]The menu language will be player side.

After use, please delete if there is a problem.

Please install manually. I'm sorry.

If there is a problem with this file, I will remove it.[/size]
